display_name: CHAT AHI (obstructive apneas all desaturations, mixed apneas all desaturations, plus hypopneas with 3% or arousal) no centrals
description: CHAT apnea hypopnea index  {[(total number of obstructive apneas) + (total number of mixed apneas) + (total number of hypopneas associated with >= 3% desaturation or arousal)] / (hours of sleep)}. will be missing if total sleep time is 0.
calculation: 60*(oarbp + oarop + oanbp + oanop + marbp + marop + manrbp + manrop + hremba3 +hroa3 + hnrba3 + hnroa3) / slpprdp
